name: RM - Architecture - Brutalism
prompt: imposing brutalist architecture of {prompt} . raw concrete surfaces, massive blocky shapes, heavy geometric forms, monolithic, cold and utilitarian, Le Corbusier style, dramatic shadows
negative_prompt: wood, delicate, ornate, painted, warm, cozy, decorated, glass

name: RM - Architecture - Bauhaus
prompt: functional bauhaus design of {prompt} . form follows function, clean lines, geometric simplicity, primary colors with white and black, steel and glass, Walter Gropius aesthetic, minimalist
negative_prompt: ornate, decorative, cluttered, victorian, baroque, messy, organic

name: RM - Architecture - Mid-Century Modern
prompt: stylish mid-century modern design of {prompt} . 1950s aesthetic, organic curves, teak wood, functionality, atomic age influence, Eames or Palm Springs vibe, vibrant pastel accents
negative_prompt: industrial, heavy, dark, gothic, ornate, antique, rustic, grunge
